member.name: D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_KIND_FLAGS
member.summary: Defines constants that specify a kind of shader cache.

member.name: D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_KIND_FLAGS.D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_KIND_FLAG_IMPLICIT_D3D_CACHE_FOR_DRIVER
member.summary: Specifies a cache that's managed by Direct3D 12 to store driver compilations of application shaders.

member.name: D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_KIND_FLAGS.D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_KIND_FLAG_IMPLICIT_D3D_CONVERSIONS
member.summary: Specifies a cache that's used to store Direct3D 12's conversions of one shader type to another (for example, DXBC shaders to DXIL shaders).

member.name: D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_KIND_FLAGS.D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_KIND_FLAG_IMPLICIT_DRIVER_MANAGED
member.summary: Specifies a cache that's managed by the driver. Operations for this cache are hints.

member.name: D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_KIND_FLAGS.D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_KIND_FLAG_APPLICATION_MANAGED
member.summary: Specifies all shader cache sessions created by the method. Requests to CLEAR with this flag apply to all currently active application cache sessions, as well as on-disk caches created without .
